job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Gross monthly salary between EUR 4,292 and EUR 6,131 (scale 09) for a 36 hour week
     * Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
     * 11% Employee Benefit Budget
     * EUR 1,400 development budget per year
     * Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
     * A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution

   View all our benefits.

   We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Pega Developer to join our team and work on GenAI topics related to Case Management. In this role, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

   You and your responsibilities
     * Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
     * Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
     * Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
     * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
     * Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

   You and your team

   The Financial Economic Crime (FEC) department at Rabobank plays a crucial role in safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing. We leverage cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions to stay ahead of emerging threats and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
job_details.full_text:
Pega Developer - GenAI Case Management

* Gross monthly salary between EUR 4,292 and EUR 6,131 (scale 09) for a 36 hour week
     * Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
     * 11% Employee Benefit Budget
     * EUR 1,400 development budget per year
     * Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
     * A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution

   View all our benefits.

   We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Pega Developer to join our team and work on GenAI topics related to Case Management. In this role, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

   You and your responsibilities
     * Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
     * Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
     * Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
     * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
     * Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

   You and your team

   The Financial Economic Crime (FEC) department at Rabobank plays a crucial role in safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing. We leverage cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions to stay ahead of emerging threats and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating GenAI capabilities into an existing Pega platform for case management, rather than developing core GenAI models or applications from scratch. While it mentions 'GenAI capabilities' and 'AI-driven case management solutions', it lacks specific details on advanced GenAI techniques like fine-tuning LLMs, RAG system development, or complex agent building. The primary emphasis is on Pega development with an AI overlay, and the role seems to be more about applying existing AI tools within a specific business context (financial crime prevention) rather than being a dedicated GenAI engineering role. The core responsibilities lean towards application development and integration within the Pega ecosystem, with AI being a feature rather than the central focus of development.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding the business context of financial crime prevention and aligning technical solutions with the goals of safeguarding the financial system and combating financial crimes.
job_tasks.phrase: safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with business analysts to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions for case management processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts... to understand requirements

job_tasks.justification: The role involves integrating 'GenAI capabilities' and developing 'AI-driven case management solutions', implying the use or adaptation of AI models within the Pega platform.
job_tasks.phrase: work on GenAI topics related to Case Management.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing AI-driven solutions to enhance case management processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions

job_tasks.justification: The core responsibility is developing and maintaining applications within the Pega platform, which is a form of software development.
The role requires integrating AI capabilities into the Pega platform, which involves software development to connect these systems.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience, which are typical goals of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires staying up-to-date with advancements in AI technologies and applying them to enhance systems, which can involve aspects of deployment and maintenance in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention implies maintaining systems that adhere to these requirements in a production setting.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies
enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.
